Name: Eternal Man: Mountain
About the game: Features 5,000 unlockable achievements Lowest price possible Guarantee that achievements will work Future trading cards Gameplay Arrow keys to move, shift to sprint, and spacebar to toggle the flashlight. Manage stamina and flashlight battery long enough to find all the eggs while avoiding crazy villagers.
